info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:20PM MDT until June 03 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 219 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunken, or 24 miles west of Hope, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dunken. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
